DOC.brief_summary: The aim experimental study test effect increase dietary calcium intake 1500 mg/day increase bone quality adolescent female . The hypothesis test : adolescent female consume high calcium diet great increase bone quality , measure densitometry ultrasound , adolescent female consume usual dietary calcium intake .
DOC.brief_title: Study Effect Calcium-rich Diet Bone Health Girls
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion female nine year age usual dietary calcium intake 1100 mg/day less . Exclusion criterion include history following : lactose intolerance , milk allergy , corticosteroid anticonvulsant therapy , familial hypercholesterolemia , mental physical handicap , cancer , rheumatoid arthritis , asthma , significant health problem report parent . We also exclude child body mass index ( BMI ) 85th percentile age gender child practice play organize sport ( include gymnastics dance ) three time per week .
DOC.keyword: bone health , bone density , bone mass
